name: GrowGrowCaterpillar
description:
Grow your caterpillar by eating leaves. Avoid the other bugs. Fulfil your destiny and become a beautiful butterfly.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to control your caterpillar.

Instructions:

Eat leaves to grow. Each leaf you crompsh adds a segment to your body.

Grow your body to ten segments to move onto the next level. Beat level 3 to grow into a butterfly.

Avoid the ravenous bugs. Bugs will eat body segments and you will have to regrow them. If a bug eats your head then it’s game over.

Made for itch.io Spring Game Jam 2021. Coded in Godot. Graphics made with Piskel and GIMP. Music made with Bosca Ceoil. Sound effects with Audacity. Font from Google Fonts.
